description: The contract is for building maintenance staff in mechanical work for maintenance and repair at the David Florida Laboratory (DFL) in Ottawa. Work to be completed described under Annex A â€“ Statement of Work. Initial period of one year + 4 additional option years.
full_summary:
### **Mechanical Services at David-Florida Laboratory**

#### **Government Annoucement**

* **Tender Title:** Mechanical Services at David-Florida Laboratory
* **Government Reference Number:** cb-179-955716
* **Solicitation Reference Number:** 9F023-23-0127-B
* **Tender Status:** It is currently expired

#### **Overview**

The Canadian Space Agency is seeking a qualified bidder to provide building maintenance services for mechanical work at the David-Florida Laboratory. This initial contract period will be one year, with an option to renew for four additional years. Interested parties may access the solicitation package at <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20636/9f023-23-0127---b---mechanical-services-at-dfl---request-for-proposal-%28rfp..pdf>.pdf and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20636/9f023-23-0127---b---mechanical-services-at-dfl---request-for-proposal-%28rfp._0.pdf>

#### **Key Dates**

* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-26
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-03, 14:00:00 (EDT)
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-10-03

#### **Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity**

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada

#### **Contract Information**

* **Contracting Agency:** Canadian Space Agency
* **Address:** 6767 Route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, Québec, J3Y 8Y9, Canada
* **Contact:** Melanie Séguin, phone: 438364-1399, email: melanie.seguin@asc-csa.gc.ca

Please note the subject needs to be a bold text and each section should be table of contents style as seen above. Also, English and French details can be excluded from the final output and any region, location information can also be excluded if not needed for the context. The tenders will be closed already so you don't need to schedule another closing date. Also the `initial period of one year + 4 additional option years` has been removed as it is mentioned in the contract itself.

Additional information requested by II Branch
